[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-materials](./harp-materials.md) &gt; [FadingFeature](./harp-materials.fadingfeature.md) &gt; [onBeforeCompile](./harp-materials.fadingfeature.onbeforecompile.md)

## FadingFeature.onBeforeCompile() function

This function should be called on implementors of FadingFeature in the `onBeforeCompile` callback of that material. It adds the required code to the shaders and declares the new uniforms that control fading based on view distance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function onBeforeCompile(fadingMaterial: FadingFeature, shader: THREE.Shader): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fadingMaterial | [FadingFeature](./harp-materials.fadingfeature.md) | Material to add uniforms to. |
|  shader | THREE.Shader | \[\[THREE.WebGLShader\]\] containing the vertex and fragment shaders to add the special includes to. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
